title: The Business of photography
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Photography - Study and teaching
Crafts & Visual Arts/Photography - Study and teaching
description: Whether you're already a working pro or just beginning to think about a career in photography, this video is for you. You'll meet the art directors and the editors who actually buy pictures and give out the profitable assignments. This video contains three half-hour episodes for easy viewing, the topics include preparing your portfolio, choosing your direction, formats, editing your work, selling your services, how the business works, breaking in, digging deeper, pricing and billing
